Home.title: beeps Inc.
Home.welcome: Welcome to the beeps Inc. software workshop!
Home.explore: Explore the challenges the company addresses below...

Accordion.whatIsBeepsContent: beeps Inc. is an IT company founded by Ihor beepstephan, specializing in creating modern web applications using fresh cutting-edge technologies like React, Next.js, and NestJS.
Accordion.whatIsBeepsGuide: Learn more about our services and projects by visiting
Accordion.whatIsBeepsGuideEnd: to see how we can help your business.
Accordion.taskComplexity: What level of complexity can beeps Inc. handle?
Accordion.taskComplexityContent: We are capable of tackling tasks of any complexity: from simple web applications to intricate full-stack projects with AI integration.
Accordion.taskComplexityGuideEnd: to learn more about our capabilities.
Accordion.teamComposition: What is the team composition at beeps Inc.?
Accordion.teamCompositionContent1: Currently, beeps Inc. is a one-person team, with Ihor beepstephan taking on the roles of developer, designer, and project manager.
Accordion.teamCompositionContent2: Despite the small size, we are actively working on expanding the team and looking for talented professionals.
Accordion.teamCompositionContent3: If you’d like to join us or hire me, reach out via the contact page!

Projects.title: Our Projects
Projects.project1Desc: A web application for viewing available movies in cinemas.
Projects.project2Desc: A web application with Google authorization, where any user can leave a message.
Projects.project3Desc: A web application with authorization via Steam, where you can view your Steam account statistics and receive game recommendations using AI.
Projects.project3Tech: ReactJS, NestJS, TailwindCSS, Zustand, PostgreSQL, Redis, OpenAI API, Steam API, Steam OpenID

About.title: About Us
About.description: Learn more about our team and values.
About.mission1: To create fast and high-quality software using the latest technologies and implementing new trends, which will help our customers stay in the flow.
About.team1: Our team consists of talented developers and designers, we would like to hear it, but at the moment our team consists of only one person, namely Ihor beepstephan.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Get in touch with us for collaboration or support.

BioTimeline.event1Text: During computer science lessons, I got acquainted with my first programming language, Pascal, which didn’t inspire me to continue programming.
BioTimeline.event2Text: I enrolled in a local university majoring in Software Engineering, where I started learning the basics of programming with C++.
BioTimeline.event3Text: I developed my programming skills, learned OOP, and got introduced to Assembly language. I also worked on my first major project.
BioTimeline.event4Text: I worked on my first major project evaluating the professors of my department. The technologies used were C#, Windows Forms, and MySQL.
BioTimeline.event5Text: I participated in competitive programming at the regional and local levels, learning databases and the Python language.
BioTimeline.event6Text: I completed a small project with a partner—a software for managing car dealerships. The technologies used were C#, Windows Forms, and PostgreSQL.
BioTimeline.event7Text: I started exploring web technologies. I learned JavaScript and the React library through a Udemy course, enjoyed it, and began diving deeper into this field.
BioTimeline.event8Text: I worked on my first relatively large project with React and TailwindCSS called Kinobratva, a web app for viewing movies currently in theaters.
BioTimeline.event9Text: I attempted my first test task at a local IT company, which I failed due to a lack of knowledge in using NestJS for backend development. This helped me identify the tech stack I want to master next, and I returned to my university studies.
BioTimeline.event10Text: I created a blog project using React and Firebase.
BioTimeline.event11Text: I wanted to solidify my React knowledge after completing a course with a simple app for randomizing computer games, but ended up creating a large full-stack project called Beeps Steamhelper using ReactJS, ViteJS, NestJS, Zustand, PostgreSQL, Redis, Steam OpenID, Steam API, and OpenAI API.
BioTimeline.event12Text: I plan to expand my tech stack by adding React Native, Flutter, and Golang.
